name: black_friday_offer_1
description: High-contrast Black Friday spotlight offer post with brand logo, bold BLACK FRIDAY headline, discount ribbon, description, and website.

samples.description: From fashion to electronics, get everything you need at Black Friday prices!

fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter the URL for the logo image (PNG/SVG recommended)
fieldPrompt.brand_name: Enter the brand name to show next to the logo
fieldPrompt.ribbon_text: Enter the ribbon text (e.g., 'UP TO 50% OFF')
fieldPrompt.description: Enter the description text for the offer
fieldPrompt.website: Enter the website or URL label (e.g., 'www.reallygreatsite.com')
fieldPrompt.accent_primary_color: Enter the primary accent color (hex, used for the ribbon)
fieldPrompt.accent_secondary_color: Enter the secondary accent color (hex, used for general text)
fieldPrompt.background_color: Enter the background color (hex, used for body and post background)
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace or extend the default template structure

components.html_content:
${big_text_top}
${ribbon_text}
${big_text_bottom}
${description}
${website}
${custom_html}
